text.en: In the language of India:ārya-maitrī-praṇidhānarāja
text.en-trans: gyagar ké du arya maitri pranidhana radza

text.en: In the language of Tibet:pakpa champé mönlam gyi gyalpo
text.en-trans: böké du pakpa jampé mönlam gyi gyalpo

text.en: Homage to all buddhas and bodhisattvas!
text.en-trans: sangye dang changchub sempa tamché la chaktsal lo

text.en: Homage to all buddhas!
Homage to the bodhisattvas
Who possess the divine vision of seers,
And homage to the hearers as well.
Homage to bodhicitta, the heart of awakening,
text.en-trans: ngendro lé ni dok gyi ching

text.en: That keeps the lower realms at bay,
text.en-trans: tori lam ni rab tön la

text.en: That shows us the way to the higher realms,
And leads us to a state beyond ageing and death.
I go before the awakened ones
text.en-trans: sem kyi wang du gyurpé na

text.en: To confess any and all misdeeds
That I may have committed
text.en-trans: sangye chen ngar chi né su

text.en: While under the sway of mind.
May all merit accrued
Through the three kinds of actions
Become a seed for my omniscience
And inexhaustible awakening.
The buddhas are aware and rejoice in any offering
text.en-trans: chok chu dak gi zhingkham su

text.en: Made to the awakened ones
Throughout the buddhafields of the ten directions,
And so do I too rejoice.
text.en-trans: dela dak ni yi rang ngo

text.en: I hereby confess all negative actions.
I hereby rejoice in everything meritorious.
text.en-trans: sönam kün la yi rang ngo

text.en: I hereby pay homage to all buddhas.
May I attain the supreme wisdom state.
text.en-trans: dak ni yeshe chok tob shok

text.en: I exhort each and every bodhisattva
text.en-trans: chok chu dak gi chok nam na

text.en: Dwelling in the ten directions
text.en-trans: sa chu dak la nepa yi

text.en: And upon the ten bodhisattva levels
To awaken now to supreme enlightenment.
And, as they awaken to sublime enlightenment,
May they turn the wheel of Dharma
text.en-trans: dé dang chepé dü tul né

text.en: So as to tame the demons and all their hordes,
And bring benefit to every living being.
text.en-trans: chö kyi khorlo kor gyur chik

text.en: May the beat of the great drum of Dharma
text.en-trans: chö nga chenpö dra yi ni

text.en: Free beings from their suffering.
For unimaginable billions of eons,
May the awakened ones teach Dharma and remain.
text.en-trans: chö tön dzé ching zhuk gyur chik

text.en: I beg you, best of humans,
text.en-trans: döpé dam du jing gyur ching

text.en: Look upon us drowning in the mud of desires,
Bound by the ropes of craving,
text.en-trans: chingwa kün gyi ching dak la

text.en: And in other ways absolutely trapped.
text.en-trans: kang nyi chok nam zik su sol

text.en: May the buddhas not level criticism
Against those of impure minds.
text.en-trans: sangye nam ni mö mi dzé

text.en: Instead, may they give love to beings
And free them from the ocean of existence!
May I train in the likeness
Of the perfectly awakened buddhas
Of the present, past, and future,
And uphold the bodhisattva conduct.
May I bring to completion the six perfections
text.en-trans: parol chin druk dzok gyi né

text.en: And lead, to the end, the six classes of beings.
text.en-trans: dro druk semchen tar gyi shok

text.en: May I manifest at last the six super-knowledges
And reach the unsurpassed state of awakening.
May I realize the truth of emptiness
In which all is birthless and non-arising,
text.en-trans: rangzhin ma chi né ma chi

text.en: Without intrinsic nature, without location,
text.en-trans: namrik ma chi ngö ma chi

text.en: With neither mental process nor substance.
Just like the great sage, the Buddha himself,
May I realize the truth of selflessness
text.en-trans: semchen ma chi sok ma chi

text.en: In which beings do not exist, nor any living things,
text.en-trans: gangzak ma chi so ma chi

text.en: Nor an individual, nor any kind of person.
May I practice generosity free from stinginess
Without entertaining any notion of substantiality,
Nor any belief in the self nor egoistical clinging,
So that the benefit may reach all beings.
text.en-trans: serna ma chi jin tong shok

text.en: Since material things do not exist concretely,
May all my needs be spontaneously met.
Since all material things are subject to decay,
May I master the perfection of generosity.
With discipline completely flawless,
Discipline that is perfectly pure,
And discipline devoid of arrogance,
May I master the perfection of discipline.
With absence of anger—in other words, with patience,
text.en-trans: sa am yangna chu am mé

text.en: Akin to how the earth, water, and fire elements,
text.en-trans: lung gi kham tar mi né shing

text.en: And the wind element as well, dwell not anywhere,
May I complete the perfection of patience.
With persistent application of diligence
May I be ever joyful and free from laziness,
text.en-trans: ten tro lelo ma chi shing

text.en: And with strength in both body and mind
text.en-trans: tob dang denpé lü sem kyi

text.en: May I complete the perfection of diligence.
With illusion-like meditative concentration,
And bravery-inspiring meditative concentration,
And vajra-like meditative concentration,
May I master the perfection of meditation.
Acting with the three gates of liberation,
With the equality of the three times,
text.en-trans: dü sum nyampa nyi dang yang

text.en: And the threefold knowledge,
May I master the perfection of wisdom.
May I be praised by all buddhas
As I beam with light and splendour,
And with the diligence of a bodhisattva
May all my aims be accomplished.
text.en-trans: dak gi sampa dzok gyur chik

text.en: As I engage in this very conduct,
May I, the one known as Maitreya,
Bring to completion the six perfections
text.en-trans: parol chin druk dzok gyi né

text.en: And reach the ten bodhisattva levels.
At the very moment I pass away,
text.en-trans: di né shi pö gyur ma tak

text.en: May I joyfully take rebirth in Tuṣita Heaven
And, swiftly delighting the Lord Maitreya,
text.en-trans: nyurdu jam gön nyé jé né

text.en: Receive his prophecy of my awakening.
